title: Psalms 114:1
text: WHEN Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange language;

title: Psalms 114:2
text: Judah was his sanctuary, and Israel his dominion.

title: Psalms 114:3
text: The sea saw it, and fled: Jordan was driven back.

title: Psalms 114:4
text: The mountains skipped like rams, and the little hills like lambs.

title: Psalms 114:5
text: What ailed thee, O thou sea, that thou fleddest?  thou Jordan, that thou wast driven back?

title: Psalms 114:6
text: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?

title: Psalms 114:7
text: Tremble, thou earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;

title: Psalms 114:8
text: Which turned the rock into a standing water, the flint into a fountain of waters.
